com.compendium.ui.toolbars
Class UIToolBarManager

java.lang.Object
  com.compendium.ui.toolbars.UIToolBarManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
ICoreConstants, IUIConstants, IUIToolBarManager, java.io.Serializable
public class UIToolBarManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements IUIConstants, ICoreConstants, IUIToolBarManager

This class manages all the toolbars

Version:
1.0
Author:
Michelle Bachler

UIToolBarManager

public UIToolBarManager(ProjectCompendiumFrame parent,
                        javax.help.HelpBroker hb,
                        boolean isSimple)
Constructor. Create a new instance of UIToolBarManager, with the given proerties.

Parameters:
parent - the parent frame for the application.
hb - the HelpBroker to use.
isSimple - indicates if the toolbars should be draw for a simple user interface, false for a complex one.

public void updateLAF()

createToolbars

public void createToolbars()
Create the toolbar controllers and load the toolbar data from the XML file where it has been save. If no data has been saved, set up the toolbars in thier default positions.

createToolBar

private UIToolBar createToolBar(int nType)
Creates and return the toolbar for the given type for its default orientation.

Parameters:
nType - the type of the toolbar to create.
Returns:
UIToolBar the toolbar for the given type, or null if type unknown or the bar already exists

createToolBar

private UIToolBar createToolBar(int nType,
                                int nOrientation)
Creates and return the toolbar for the given type.

Parameters:
nType - the type of the toolbar to create.
nOrientation - the orientation to create the toolbar for. -1 means use the bar's default orientation.
Returns:
UIToolBar the toolbar for the given type, or null if type unknown or the bar already exists

addFloatingToolBar

public void addFloatingToolBar(UIToolBarFloater floater)
Tell the manager that a toolbar is now floating by passing the UIToolBarFloater object to it.

Specified by:
addFloatingToolBar in interface IUIToolBarManager
Parameters:
floater - com.compendium.ui.toolbars.UIToolBarFloater, the floating toolbar to add.

removeFloatingToolBar

public void removeFloatingToolBar(UIToolBarFloater floater)
Tell the manager that a toolbar is now docked by removing the UIToolBarFloater object from it.

Specified by:
removeFloatingToolBar in interface IUIToolBarManager
Parameters:
floater - com.compendium.ui.toolbars.UIToolBarFloater, the floating toolbar to remove.

disposeFloatingToolBars

public void disposeFloatingToolBars()
Dispose of all toolbars currently floating.

showFloatingToolBars

public void showFloatingToolBars()
Create instances of UIToolBarFloater, for all toolbars tha should be floating.

getToolbarXML

public java.lang.String getToolbarXML()
Returns a xml string containing the toolbar data from the toolbar controllers The UIToolBarController class has a toXML method that can be used to get this information.

Specified by:
getToolbarXML in interface IUIToolBarManager
Returns:
a String object containing formatted xml representation of the toolbar data

saveToolBarData

public void saveToolBarData()
Save all the current toolbar setting to an xml file.
